channel.title: SMGs on T8R Loadouts
channel.description: Recent content in SMGs on T8R Loadouts

item.title: MP5
item.description: Modern Warefare MP5. Supposedly not as good as the Cold War, but it’s good right now. Item Attachment Barrel Monolithic Integral Suppressor Underbarrel Merc Foregrip Stock FTAC Collapsable Ammunition 45 Round Mags Perk Slight of Hand

item.title: LC10
item.description: LC10 is actually a longer range SMG. Works well paired with a sniper like the KAR. Item Attachment Muzzle Agency Suppressor Barrel 13.9" Task Force Laser Tiger Team Spotlight Stock Raider Stock Ammunition STANAG 55 RND

item.title: MAC10
item.description: Will always be the best, even when it isn’t. Item Attachment Muzzle Agency Suppressor Barrel 5.9" Task Force Laser Tiger Team Spotlight Stock Raider Stock Ammunition STANAG 55 RND Drum

item.title: MP5 CW
item.description: Black Ops MP5. Item Attachment Muzzle Agency Suppressor Laser Tiger Team Spotlight Underbarrel Bruiser Grip Stock Raider Stock Ammunition STANAG 50 RND Drum

item.title: Milano
item.description: Pizza Milano special delivery. Item Attachment Muzzle Agency Suppressor Barrel 10.6" Task Force Optic Microflex LED Stock Raider Stock Ammunition STANAG 55 RND Drum
